ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Soloing bards
ygData.msgSnippet: A week? How about a day hehe.  Last night the group I has in at D1 first said I wish we had a shamen or chanter for speed To which I replied they were
ygData.messageBody:
A week? How about a day hehe. Last night the group I has in at D1 first
said "I wish we had a shamen or chanter for speed" To which I replied they
were getting speed fro, my songs. Later in the night the monk commented
that he wished we had a shamen for slowing to which I replied I am slowing.
His reply was, oh I did not know bards could do that. /sigh

Rokenn


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
> Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 7:35 AM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Soloing bards
>
>
> True it happens on occasion - I can count, um three or four
> times since
> March of '99 when I started playing this game... But for
> Bards - happens at
> least three or four times A WEEK!
>
> Slyde
> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 9:17 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Soloing bards
>
> uhmmm, well, last time i was in seb, grouped with a warrior
> who for some odd
> reason kept telling our wizzie to summon a pet. the wiz was
> wearing a red
> robe, /shrug. then he started to tell me (i was playing my
> enchanter):
> "mana suck this frog!" and not just one time. he would point
> to a frog and
> tell me to mana tap it. then tell the wiz to summon a pet. at
> first we kinda
> made jokes: "dude, i never bought that spell!" But he didn;t
> seem to get it
> and kept telling us what to do.
>
> Finally i told him, "dude, just exactly how long is the
> recycle time on
> theft of thought? when the spell is recycled - and when i
> need mana - trust
> me - i will tap them. and btw, our wizzie cant summon pets
> worth a darn."
>
> so, i dunno if our study is totally scientific, but its not
> just bards,
> afaict
>
> Sylly
>
>
